> Quickstride looks up to Cheetor with a happy smile on his face. He was
> glad to see his comrade.
>
> "Heeey, Cheetor, just in time! Great ta see ya! Oh, um, just ta let ya
> know, we have a comrade down here who is visually impaired, he might need
> some extra help getting out."
>
> Tucson walks forward, now able to use his sonar system.
>
> " He's right, I'm visually impaired, but just tell me where I can get a
> foot and a hand hold, and I might just be able to get myself out of here.
> I attempted something I call the inverted spider maneuver. If I can do
> that, I might just be able to get out of here myself. A little bit of
> ninjabot training. Anyway, great to have you here comrades."

From his position at the top of the pit it was very difficult for
Cheetor to see Tuscon as well as anyone down in the pit as they were
nearly a hundred meters or more away or more. "I hear ya!" Cheetor
says as he squinted to look down. "But why are you going to work so
hard when we have ol' Ramulus here?" Cheetor asked, his voice booming
down into the pit, echoing along the sides. "He's an expert at this
kinda stuff."

> "Time to go to my new home"sighed the former predacon

As Perceptor grumbled about the prospects of his new home amongst the
Maximals a metal cable with a hook began to extend its way down from
the top side of the pit. It took a minute or two to finally reach the
over 100 meter drop to the bottom. It stopped perhaps a foot or so
from the tunnel at Tuscon's position, dangling over the chasm that was
below Tuscon and the rest of his crew. A hot wind blew up from below,
causing the cable to sway slightly.

"Grab on!" Ramulus' gruff voice from the topside of the pit. While his
voice did not carry as well as Cheetor's did it was clear he was as
impatient as he always was. "We can pull you guys out."

(TAG)

Preston

OOC: FYI: Ramulus and Airhammer are based on the original transmetal
BW's characters, so feel free to have your characters have a history
with them or not as you wish :)
